siteMetadata.title: A11yTalks
siteMetadata.subtitle: Virtual meet-up featuring speakers & conversations around digital accessibility

frontmatter.title: UX vs. Accessibility - A Visual and Non-visual Perspective
frontmatter.subtitle: Eileen Becker-Rendano & Jason Cortes
frontmatter.description: Accessibility is often segmented off, but a solid accessible strategy touches many areas of the website lifecycle. In fact, it is one of the cornerstones of a good user experience. In this discussion, you will hear from two accessibility experts in pursuit of true Universal Design â€“ bringing both a visual and a non-visual perspective.
